content.rendered:
Real Estate

Real estate dialer : Boost your real estate empire

Dial more contacts in less time, grow your business and deliver the leads in real-time. With Dialer360 real estate dialer gets more proficiencies out of their workflow.

Request a Demo
5 star rating
★★★★★ 5/5

Trusted by over 12,000 business
and 18,000 users

Previous
Next
Real Estate Dialer

What is a real estate dialer?

Don’t waste your time by manually dialing your potential customer. The real estate dialer is very fast and effective saving your time and you can create a campaign huge volume of your real estate potential customers. Increase your sales and accomplish your goal, real estate customers can keep you on your toes.

Grow Business

How our real estate dialer nurtures your business nurtures your business

Smooth your workflow

Real estate sales can be a complex task like taking notes, saving call details, calling potential customers, and following up. Reduce these complexities by employing a real estate dialer. This dialer put all these actions in an organized mechanism and agents enhance their productivity due to minimal human intrusion.

No installation

You need nothing to install because our real estate dialer is cloud-based. This dialer is ready when you log into your CRM. After that, queue up your list and press start. More conversation as well as more possibilities to enhance sales. Save your cost for installation and make your business profitable.

Feasible interface

Easy and user-friendly interface. An easy click to start a call or texting. Click the preloaded note and add this customer history quickly. You can text your lead while leaving a voicemail on the same screen entirely. This is custom designed specifically for real estate agents. With effective and efficient features of the real estate dialer.

CRM Integrations

Dialer360 can integrate with
your favourite CRM

Feature List

Power your business with Dialer360 exceptional Features

Recording Portal

The recording portal record every call automatically to increase the quality. Record 100 plus calls and get its backup when you need it. You can also find any recorded call history on our server if anyone is deleted.

Display Local Caller ID

Get a positive response from your potential customers with the distinct feature of displaying local caller Id. Let your customers feel easy by showing them their local caller ID although you are not physically present there.

Multiple dialing modes

Set dialing mode according to your need. Our dialer has multiple dialing modes like power, preview, progressive and predictive. Select contacts and start dialing with your preferred dialing mode to expand your services.

TPS/DNC Filtering

Some calls are not marketing calls and government takes action if a marketing agency makes these calls. Save your contact list with TPS/DNC filtering and dial no TPS number that is listed on the TPS list.

Advanced Reporting & analytics

Generate customer reports with advanced features as well as customize this according to your business requirement. Analyze overall customer data like call volume, call queue, average response time, and how many calls receives per day.

Agent Status board

Monitor your agents and evaluate their performance. Track agents individually with this helpful feature and analyze which agents make more sales. View all important information in one place and take action to improve the business.

Awards

Award-winning customer service

Due to our innovative solution for call center organization, our company recognized as a leading company.

CLIENT REVIEWS

What our client's say about us

“This software has the most transparency of all that I've used in the past. The reports are really helpful in terms of allowing me to see how individual campaigns are performing and the real-time status bar is a real jewel for seeing what is or isn't happening.“
Coray W.
President
Other Products

Other products may you like

Voice Broadcast

Voice broadcasting is a wonderful communication facility that broadcasts your complete message to thousands of people at the same time.

Ringless Voicemail

Ringless voicemail is an efficient way of communication that permits the users to send the message directly into the individual voicemail inbox.

AI Dialer

Optimize your sales with our next-generation Ai dialer. It dials leads when picks up the lead then it connects to this lead to an available agent.
